replace.sel: /aiscript/interrupts/library/actions[@name='CalculateMiningEfficiency']/do_if[@value='@$evalware and (typeof $evalware == datatype.ware) and @$basescantime and this.sector']/do_if[@value='($_wareefficiency lt 1) and ($_skillproportion gt 0)']/set_value[@name='$_result_efficiency'][@exact='(1.0f - $_wareefficiency) * (([this.assignedcontrolled.combinedskill, 1].max / 100.0f) ^ $_skillexponent)']/@exact
